title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A modern e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.
challengesFaced: Implementing secure payment processing with Stripe.
Managing complex state for shopping cart functionality.
Optimizing product search and filtering performance.
Ensuring responsive design across all devices.
whatsNext: Add real-time notifications for order updates.
Implement advanced analytics dashboard.
Add multi-vendor support for marketplace functionality.
Integrate with third-party shipping providers.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking capabilities.
challengesFaced: Implementing real-time collaboration features with Socket.io.
Managing complex user permissions and team roles.
Optimizing database queries for large project datasets.
Creating intuitive drag-and-drop interface for task management.
whatsNext: Add mobile app support with React Native.
Implement advanced reporting and analytics.
Add integration with popular project management tools.
Create AI-powered task prioritization features.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A comprehensive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and weather alerts. Built with modern web technologies.
challengesFaced: Integrating multiple weather APIs for comprehensive data.
Creating responsive charts and visualizations.
Implementing geolocation-based weather detection.
Optimizing API calls and caching strategies.
whatsNext: Add historical weather data analysis.
Implement weather alerts and notifications.
Add support for multiple cities and favorites.
Create weather trend predictions using machine learning.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: A social media management dashboard for scheduling posts, analyzing engagement metrics, and managing multiple social media accounts from one platform.
challengesFaced: Integrating with multiple social media APIs (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram).
Handling OAuth authentication for different platforms.
Managing rate limits and API quotas effectively.
Creating intuitive analytics and reporting features.
whatsNext: Add AI-powered content suggestions and optimization.
Implement advanced analytics and reporting features.
Add support for more social media platforms.
Create team collaboration and approval workflows.
